snippet.title: BEAR WITH ME: THE COMPLETE COLLECTION — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Bear With Me: The Complete Collection features all previously released episodes as well as the new prequel, The Lost Robots! Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1050000

Dark interrogations, sarcastic banter, and challenging puzzles await our heroes as they collect clues to solve a bigger, more sinister mystery. Featuring an evocative soundtrack, expansive narrative and a uniquely drawn 2D animated art style accented by film noir, Bear With Me will take players through an emotional rollercoaster of a journey that will determine the fates of our protagonists.

Bear With Me: The Lost Robots and Bear With Me: The Complete Edition is launching for XBox One, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch,  PC (Steam) and mobile on July 31st, 2019!

Wishlist On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1050000
Like on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ModusGames/
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Modus_Games
Join our Discord: http://discord.gg/modus
